item.title: 11 Dec 2025 00:20
item.description: Those four words - ‘But it is mine’; Definitely makes it all worth it. I have a similar setup wherein I use a Hetzner VPS just to proxy in all traffic to my selfhosted stuff. Initially had wireguard running across my devices. Switched to tailscale for a bit more ease of management. Maybe every six months or so something breaks, but it is all manageable. Gets fixed if I really want to, else it stays by the wayside until it really needs to come back up. ðŸ”—
item.content:encoded: Those four words - ‘But it is mine’; Definitely makes it all worth it. I have a similar setup wherein I use a Hetzner VPS just to proxy in all traffic to my selfhosted stuff. Initially had wireguard running across my devices. Switched to tailscale for a bit more ease of management. Maybe every six months or so something breaks, but it is all manageable. Gets fixed if I really want to, else it stays by the wayside until it really needs to come back up. ðŸ”—
